document_data.orgname: the Company of the Bright Spear
document_data.mainbody: The '''Company of the Bright Spear''' was an [[adventuring company]] in the [[Dalelands]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Organization: The Company of the Bright Spear were six in number. The tall warrior [[Burlane]] bore the magical [[Bright Spear]] and led the company. A younger bladesman rode with him, the merry [[Ferostil]]. [[Delg Hammerhand]], a [[dwarf]], was also a [[warrior]]. His constant companion was the [[bard]] [[Rymel]], probably the brightest of them all. The [[wizard]] [[Thail]] deferred to his younger, louder companions. Last and least of the company was the [[thief]], one [[Shandril Shessair]], a bright-eyed, soft-spoken waif in ill-fitting old [[breeches]] and a much-patched [[tunic]].
document_data.History: The group was wiped out in a battle with a large party of [[Cult of the Dragon]] members, leaving only Shandril and Delg as survivors.
